verses.roman:
prati-dina prabhu yadi yā'na daraśane
jala-karaṅga lañā govinda yāya prabhu-sane

synonyms: prati-dina—every day; prabhu—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; yadi—when; yā'na—goes; daraśane—to see Lord Jagannātha; jala-karaṅga—a waterpot; lañā—taking; govinda—the personal servant of the Lord (Govinda); yāya—goes; prabhu-sane—with Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu.
translation: Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu had been regularly visiting the temple of Jagannātha every day, and at that time Govinda, His personal servant, used to carry His waterpot and go with Him.
